SocEfficiency.name: SOC效率因子
SocEfficiency.chargeIntegralEfficiency_comment: 充电效率因子, 单位1%
SocEfficiency.dischargeIntegralEfficiency_comment: 放电效率因子, 单位1%

SocCalibParam.name: SOC校准参数
SocCalibParam.capHighCalibAverageVolt_comment: 过充容量校正平均电压阈值, 单位mv
SocCalibParam.capLowCalibAverageVolt_comment: 过放容量校正平均电压阈值, 单位mv
SocCalibParam.capLowCalibSoc_comment: 过放容量校正SOC阈值, 单位1%
SocCalibParam.capLowCalibDelay_comment: 过放容量校正延时, 单位秒

ChargeParam.name: 直流快充
ChargeParam.chargeTotalVoltMax_comment: 最高允许充电总压, v
ChargeParam.chargeCurrentMax_comment: 最高允许充电电流, A
ChargeParam.chargeCurrentMin_comment: 最小允许充电电流(截止充电电流), A

ChargeParam.name: 交流慢充
ChargeParam.chargeTotalVoltMax_comment: 最高允许充电总压, v
ChargeParam.chargeCurrentMax_comment: 最高允许充电电流, A
ChargeParam.chargeCurrentMin_comment: 最小允许充电电流(截止充电电流), A
